name: 4th of July VR
description:
It’s the Fourth of July and it is time to shoot off fireworks! Create, perform, and take aim in three engaging modes:

Show Mode: Be the creator! Launch your own fireworks show for the VR audience!

Spectator Mode: Be the face in the crowd. Sit back and enjoy the show in VR!

Arcade Mode: Take aim and try to get a high score while shooting fireworks at moving targets
